alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 14 at 4:27PM EST until December 15 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM EARLY FRIDAY THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...The Florida Keys. * WHEN...From early Friday morning through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rainfall is expected at times early Friday morning through late Saturday night. Storm totals of 3-6 inches with locally higher amounts in excess of 8 inches is possible. High rainfall rates along with repeated bouts of rainfall may result in flooding of low-lying and poor drainage areas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
